text: L’Humanité Dimanche is a French language weekly magazine which is the supplement of l'Humanité newspaper. ==History and profile== L’Humanité Dimanche was established in 1948. At the end of the 1990s the magazine was closed. It was relaunched on 9 March 2006. It is a Sunday supplement of l'Humanité and has a communist political stance. ==References== ==External links== Category:1948 establishments in France Category:Communist magazines Category:French-language magazines Category:Magazines established in 1948 Category:Magazines published in Paris Category:Newspaper supplements Category:Political magazines published in France Category:Sunday magazines Category:Weekly magazines published in France
title: L'Humanité Dimanche
